rootCause: Test 38 'mdns_publish_static surfaces permission denied when service unreadable' failed because it expected stderr to contain 'Timed out waiting for Avahi to publish' but instead encountered a chown permission error 'chown: changing ownership of '/tmp/bats-run-Cx9AOg/test/38/services/.k3s-mdns.n6G7Wq': Operation not permitted'. The test is attempting to verify permission error handling but the actual error occurs earlier during file ownership changes.
resolution: Modify the test to avoid chown operations in non-root test environments, or adjust mdns_publish_static to handle permission errors more gracefully without attempting ownership changes that will fail. Consider using test fixtures that don't require chown or mocking the ownership change operations.
